programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;RT audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o clfilt_lowpass.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1 ; white noise
asig rand 0.5 outs asig, asig
endin
instr 2 ; filtered noise
asig rand 0.9 ; Lowpass filter signal asig with a ; 10-pole Butterworth at 500 Hz. a1 clfilt asig, 500, 0, 10 outs a1, a1
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 2 i 2 2 2 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
